title: WTB Alfred Soldier Kearns cards or photos
author: Dguinasso

posts.post_title: WTB Alfred Soldier Kearns cards or photos
posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase cards or photos of Alfred Soldier Kearns.  Soldier was a heavyweight from 1909-1920. He was a White Hope out of Brooklyn.  He’s not on the T220 checklist.  I’ve seen some Romeo y Julietta cards out there.


[url]Dguinasso@aol.com[/url]
